section.title: Horizon Timeout
section.p: The default session timeout for Horizon is 1800 seconds or 30 minutes.

As an administrator, you can change the session timeout by changing the value of the SESSION_TIMEOUT to anything less than or equal to 14400, which is equal to four hours. Values greater than 14400 are likely to conflict with the default OpenStack auth token timeouts.
section.note: Increasing the value of SESSION_TIMEOUT increases the risk of abuse.

section.p: Follow these steps to change and commit the Horizon timeout value.
